result.arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ فَحَسۡبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
result.translation: 206. woo munaafiqhtuk Yallak meesit kaak iyyen ken tekkek, woh moggolaay kaxxamariino kaa geytaah dambit dambi ossita, toysa jahannam girah digaala kaa xiqtah, jahannam gira is manxu gacta fidooy!
